Player onPlayerJoined()
        Returns:
        the player that joined.

      • onAction

        void onAction(@NotNull
              Player fromPlayer,
              @NotNull
              IMove move)

        Called by the Server upon receiving a Move.

        Parameters:
        fromPlayer - The player who invoked this action.
        Throws:
        GameLogicException - if any invalid action is done
        InvalidMoveException - if the received move violates the rules

      • start

        void start()

        Server or an administrator requests the game to start now.

      • stop

        void stop()

        Stops the Game, removing any open handles.

        No events (GameOver etc) should be sent out after this method has been called.

      • step

        void step()

        Advance the Game by one turn.

      • getWinner

        @Nullable
ITeam getWinner()

        Returns the interface ITeam that won the game. Null if not finished or no winner.

        See Also:
        interface ITeam

      • getPluginUUID

        @NotNull
java.lang.String getPluginUUID()

        Used for generating replay name.

        @NotNull
java.util.List<sc.framework.plugins.Player> getPlayers()
        Returns:
        the two players, the startplayer will be first in the List
